clinical_study.brief_title: The Effects of Two Volitional Interventions to Improve Oral Health Behaviour Among Iranian Adolescents
clinical_study.official_title: The Effects of Two Volitional Interventions to Improve Oral Health Behaviour Among Iranian Adolescents

brief_summary.textblock: the present study had two main aims. First, due to the current underconsumption of dental brush adolescents, the investigators should apply a volitional intervention to increase oral health behvaiour in adolescents. Second, the investigators aim to compare the effectiveness of action planning intervention and implementation intention will improve oral health behavior in adolescents.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a study to explore the impact of two volitional interventions on brushing intentions , behaviors and clinical characteristics among a sample of adolescent students.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 14 Years to 19 Years
- Ability to understand Persian language Adolescents attending high schools in Qazvin
Exclusion Criteria:
- participate in any kind of oral health education and promotion programs
- undergoing orthodontic treatment
